description.title: Visibility Config: subscribe, ContractCfg.PRIVATE, Field.EVERYONE on two events
description.purpose: Uses a simple guessing game, with ContractCfg.PRIVATE and Field.EVERYONE set for the Guessed and Attempts events. Two gateway connections are used, the first by a dev user that deploys the contract and the second by a player of the game. Both users run a script to subscribed for the events; both users should see all events.
